section.name: AndroMDA EJB Cartridge
section.p: The purpose of this cartridge is to generate an CMP Entity EJB persistence tier, fronted by Session EJB business object facades. To learn how to use this cartridge, please see the Profile and Namespace sections.
If you're using MagicDraw as your modeling tool, it is recommended to use the andromda-profile.zip to get an idea about Stereotypes or tagged values to use.
